EmailTemplate.subject: Tickets now available for Ignite 2015 - our fantastic launch event for The Challenge Society!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey there {!Contact.Name},
As a graduate of the National Citizen Service you have exclusive access to a HUGE range of opportunities year round through The Challenge Society. Now half term has officially started (whoop whoop) do check out that amazing events coming up over this next months, exclusively for YOU.
IGNITE 2015
Learn new skills, build great connections, attend a range of fantastic workshops!
Saturday 28th of November 12:00 - 18:00
UCA Epsom, 21 Ashely Road, Epsom, KT18 5BE...
CV's, Interviews, Apprenticeships, UCAS, and much much more...
Click here to reserve your ticket!
OXJAM MUSIC FESTIVAL
For the whole month of October, OxJam is about making music, raising money and helping to end poverty!
What a great way to celebrate your graduation, reunite your wave, and spend the evening celebrating local young musical talent!
New Addington Community Centre, New Addington, Croydon, CR0 0JB.
Click here to get YOUR ticket!
SHARE THE LOVE
NCS grads! Its time to share the love for NCS!
It's pretty simple: nominate friends to do NCS and when they do, get access to exclusive rewards!
Please help us spread the word event further by liking, posting, sharing, event posting face-to- face about Share the Love!
You can start by sharing the video to the NCS Facebook page here
Check out sharethelove.ncsyes.co.uk for more information!
GO OUTDOORS VOUCHER
Remember - whatever you are up to next, you can still get a special Go Outdoors discount!
Whether you plan to travel, explore the wet 'n' wild outdoors, or pitch a tent at a festival, get discount on hiking boots, outdoor equipment and loads more!
Make sure you are wearing the best outdoor clobber.
Click here, go forth, and redeem!
Like us on facebook and follow us on twitter to be kept up to date with the latest information.
If you have any questions do head to our fantastic new website or send an email to Rhiannon at tcs.southlondon@the-challenge.org.
The Challenge Society team!
